articles.title: GTL Offers Newsfeed Subscription Service to Inmates
articles.description: RESTON, Va., Oct. 23, 2017 /PRNewswire/ -- GTL today announced that inmates can now keep up to date on world events through the latest Inspire® inmate tablet application—Newsfeed. read more
